snippet.title: Cabernet | Launch Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
I come bearing some bittersweet news: Cabernet will not be released on October 24th and will instead launch in early 2025. We will, however be taking this opportunity to bring Cabernet to Nintendo Switch, Playstation, and Xbox at the same time. You can read the full statement in the letter from the development team.
Full Statement: https://x.com/PIntroverts/status/1846220331830149515

Cabernet is a 2D narrative RPG set in a 19th century Eastern European inspired world where you play as Liza, a newly converted vampire, struggling between keeping her humanity and abandoning it for her new life as a blood sucker. Which direction will you take Liza?
